revised_title: Stationary Gravity Waves in Perfect Liquids: Finite Periodic Waves
tldr: The authors explore the existence and properties of strictly periodic finite stationary waves on the surface of a perfect liquid. They use a method of successive approximation to the solution of hydrodynamical equations and find strong evidence for the existence of periodic stationary waves and a finite stable wave of greatest height. The study also examines the wave pressure on a breakwater and the modification of calculations for finite water depth.
